[\[1a\]]
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D3807}]@##/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum pa rgya cher 'grel pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shes rab bdag nyid pha rol phyin pa'i gtso/_/_
[\[1b.2\]]rgyal ba'i yum la gus par phyag 'tshal nas/_/bla ma'i lung gis bdag la phan pa'i phyir/_/'di yi gzhung 'grel gnod 'joms bya bar 'dod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
[\[1b.3\]]gzugs kyi sku dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs srung bar gtogs pa'i phyir/_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la/_'phags pa byams pas 'khor gyi nang du dris pa
[\[1b.4\]]dang /_'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa 'di bdag gis thos par khas 'ches so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad bshad do/_/_
[\[1b.5\]]zhes ci'i phyir ma brjod ce na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa ni/_phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid kyi spyod yul du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]khams sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i 'dul ba'i rigs dang /_bsam pa dang /_spyod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_dbang po tha dad pa rnams la/_skad cig gcig la yang mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal
[\[2a.2\]]ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_mi skye ba dang /_mi 'gag pa dang /_gzod ma nas zhi ba dang /_rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs par dbye ba dang /_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye
[\[2a.3\]]mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa la sogs par dbye ba dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po la sogs
[\[2a.4\]]par dbye ba dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sogs par dbye ba rnams/_skad sna tshogs dang /_sgo sna tshogs dang /_sgra sna tshogs dang /_cho
[\[2a.5\]]'phrul sna tshogs dang /_'jug pa sna tshogs dang /_'bras bu thob pa sna tshogs kyis skad cig de nyid la bshad pa'i ye shes gcig gis ston te/_de snyed cig char phyag na rdo rje'i spyod yul du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir/_
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad bshad do zhes ma brjod kyi/_bdag gi spyod yul du ci tsam gyur pa nyi tshe bstan pa'i phyir/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya bar ston to/_/de ltar cis mngon zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo las/_zhi ba'i blo gros
[\[2b.2\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa grangs med pa dag na/_sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gis/_sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no zhes bya ste/_zhi ba'i blo
[\[2b.3\]]gros gal te sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_zhi ba'i blo gros sems can de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/_gnas brtan shA ri'i bu'i shes rab dang /_ye shes lta bu dang ldan par yang gyur la/_shA ri'i bu lta bu'i sems can de dag thams cad
[\[2b.4\]]kyi shes rab dang /_ye shes gang yin pa'i shes rab dang /_ye shes de sems can gcig la yod par gyur te/_rnam grangs 'dis/_sems can thams cad shes rab dang ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur la/_zhi ba'i blo gros sems can de dag thams cad kyis/_bskal
[\[2b.5\]]pa las lhag par the tshom dri ba bsams shing gzhal te yongs su btsal la/_sems can gcig gis the tshom dri ba gang yin pa de gnyis pa ma yin pa'i rnam grangs 'dis/_zhi ba'i blo gros sems can thams cad kyi the tshom dri ba tha dad pa bsams te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du dong nas/_se gol
[\[2b.6\]]gtogs pa srid la the tshom dri ba de dag gsol kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis sems gcig gis rjes su zhugs pa'i dran pas/_de dag gis the tshom thams cad bzung nas/_gsung gcig brjod pas the tshom thams cad gcod de/_de dag thams cad kyang rang gi the tshom bsal
[\[2b.7\]]bar shes shing /_zhus pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pas thams cad kyang sems rangs par gyur to zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu ste/_de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba rnams la bstan pa'i rim pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' chos
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]sdud pa rnams kyi spyod yul du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad bshad do zhes ma brjod par bdag gi spyod yul du ji tsam gyur pa dang /_ci thos pa nyi tshe bstan pa'i phyir/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba gsungs so/_/dus gcig
[\[3a.2\]]na zhes bya ba ni/_dus gang yang rung ba cig gcig na zhes bya ba'i don to/_/ci'i phyir dus nges pa ma mdzad ce na/_dus nges par bstan pa ched mi che ba'i phyir ro/_/rnam pa gcig tu na rtsod pa med par bya ba'i phyir yang /_dus nges pa ma bstan te/_'di ltar/_de bzhin
[\[3a.3\]]gshegs pa ni skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid kyi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs dang /_gnas sna tshogs rnams su byang chub sems dpa' 'am/gzhan yang rung ste/_'dul ba sna tshogs rnams la chos bshad pa/_rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad par snang ste/_gal
[\[3a.4\]]te byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_gdul ba'i 'gro ba de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus par gyur na/_'di skad du de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yul 'di zhes bya ba na/_bdag cag gi de na bzhugs so/_/bdag
[\[3a.5\]]cag gi de na bzhugs so zhes rtsod pa'am/_yid gnyis su 'gyur ba yang srid de/_de ltar 'gyur du dogs pa'i phyir/_thams cad du yang chos sdud pa mdzad pa rnams kyis dus nges pa ma mdzad do/_/yang rnam pa gcig tu na/_rgyal po'i khab na lan mang du bzhugs bzhugs
[\[3a.6\]]pa'i phyir/_rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs pa'i dus cig gcig na zhes bya ba'i don to/_/bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bdud bzhi bcom pa dang ldan pa la bya'o/_/yang rnam pa gcig tu na rten brten par bya ba dang ldan pa la yang /_bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ste/_
[\[3a.7\]]brten par bya ba yang rnam pa drug ste/_dbang phyug dang /_ye shes dang /_grags pa dang /_dpal dang /_bsod nams dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_brten par bya ba 'di rnams/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mnga' zhing ldan pas na/_bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o/_/_
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs zhes bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gnas mchod rten du gyur pa bstan pas/_sems can rnams kyi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gnas nges par bstan to/_/gnas de na bzhugs pa yang rnam pa bzhis bzhugs te/_
[\[3b.2\]]spyod lam gyis bzhugs pa dang /_chos 'chad pas bzhugs pa dang /_snyoms par 'jug pas bzhugs pa dang /_nang du yang dag 'jog gis bzhugs pa'o/_/de la sku'i phrin las su gtogs pa gang ci yang rung ste zhes de dag thams cad ni spyod lam gyis bzhugs pa'o/_/_
[\[3b.3\]]gsung gi phrin las gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni chos 'chad pas bzhugs pa'o/_/thugs kyi phrin las gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni snyoms par 'jug pas bzhugs pa dang /_nang du yang dag 'jog gis bzhugs pa'o/_/de la rtag tu mnyam par 'jog cing ting nge
[\[3b.4\]]'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bzhugs pa'o/_/thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten la dgongs pa dang /_lha la sogs pa 'ong ba'i go skabs dbye ba'i phyir gcig pu dben pa na bzhugs pa ni/_nang du yang dag 'jog gis bzhugs pa'o/_/rgyal
[\[3b.5\]]po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod 'phungs pa la zhes bya ba ni/_gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan te/_yul de na 'dre gdon gyis rtag tu gtses pa las/_grong khyer gyi ming rgyal po'i khab tu btags nas 'dre gdon gyis mi tshugs par gyur te/_de tshun chad yul dang grong khyer de
[\[3b.6\]]rgyal po'i khab tu grags so/_/yang rnam pa gcig tu na grong khyer de grong khyer thams cad kyi gtso bo yin te/_rgyal po dang 'dra ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab ces bya'o/_/mdo sde 'di yang gsung rab thams cad kyi gtso bo yin par bstan pa'i phyir/_grong khyer gyi mchog der bshad
[\[3b.7\]]pa smos so/_/rgyal po'i khab ces bya ba'i yul dang grong khyer de yang rab tu rgya che bas/_rgyal po'i khab kyis phyogs gang kho na na bzhugs pa mi shes te/_de gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/_rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod 'phungs pa la zhes bya ba gsungs so/_/ri de'i
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]dbyibs bya rgod 'phungs pa 'dra ba'i phyir bya rgod 'phungs pa zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po'i khab dang ri bya rgod 'phungs pa zhes bya ba'i gnas gnyis smos pa ni khyim pa'i phyogs dang /_rab tu byung ba'i phyogs gnyis la phan 'dogs pa bstan pa ste/_rgyal po'i
[\[4a.2\]]khab smos pas ni bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms mdzad cing gshegs pa'i tshe/_khyim pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong na dad pa skyes te/_bsod snyoms la sogs pa 'bul zhing /_bsod snyoms
[\[4a.3\]]byed pa'i sgo nas phan 'dogs so/_/ri bya rgod 'phungs pa smos pas rab tu byung ba'i phyogs su gtogs pa rnams la/_chos kyis phan 'dogs pa bstan pa ste/_rab tu byung ba rnams 'du 'dzi'i nang na mi gnas par dgon pa'i sa phyogs ri la gnas pa rnams la dam pa'i chos
[\[4a.4\]]bshad pa'i sgo nas phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa ste/_'khor yang dge slong gi 'khor dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnam pa gnyis
[\[4a.5\]]te/_de gnyis las dge slong gi 'khor sngar smos pa ni/_rab tu byung ba rnams sbyin gnas su gyur pa'i mchog yin pas/_'jig rten pas mchod cing bkur sti bya ba'i 'os yin pa dang /[ (]bcom [,]bcom ldan [)]'das kyi zham 'bring na rtag tu gnas pa dang /_'jig rten pa thams cad kyi
[\[4a.6\]]spyod yul du gyur pa'i phyir dge slong gi 'khor sngar smos so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni/_khyim pa'i tshul du gnas pas sbyin gnas su ma grags pa dang /_sems can gyi don la gshegs pas zham 'bring na mi rtag pa dang /_'jig rten pa thams cad kyi spyod yul
[\[4a.7\]]ma yin pa'i phyir phyis smos so/_/dge slong lnga stong tsam dang zhes bya ba'i grangs smos pas 'khor mang ba bstan pa'o/_/thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni/_'khor rnams yon tan phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i sgo nas che ba
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]nyid bstan pa ste/_thams cad kyang zhes bya bas ni 'khor 'phags pa nyan thos de dag thams cad kyang /_dgra bcom pa sha stag ste/_'khor de'i nang na rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogs pa slob pa'i gang zag gam/_so so'i skye bo gcig kyang med par bstan pa'o/_/dgra
[\[4b.2\]]bcom pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i dgra rnams bcom pa'i phyir ro/_/yang rnam pa gcig tu na/_a ri han zhes bya ba mi skye ba'i don la yang snyeg ste/_'khor bar slar mi skye ba'i chos nyid can sha stag go zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yang rnam pa gcig tu na/_a ri han zhes bya
[\[4b.3\]]ba 'os pa'am/_nus pa la yang snyeg ste/_bdag gi don thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas/_gzhan la rjes su ston par 'os shing nus pa'am/_dge 'dun dkon mchog ces bya bar 'os pa'am/_khams gsum gyi mi dang lha'i gtso bo rnams kyis mchod pa rnam pa
[\[4b.4\]]du mas mchod par 'os pa sha stag go zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yang rnam pa gcig tu na a ri han zhes bya ba mchod pa la yang snyeg ste/_'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la sgrub pa'i mchod pas rgyun mi 'chad par mchod par byed pa'i phyir yang dgra bcom
[\[4b.5\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba ni zag pa rnam pa bzhi ste/_'dod pa'i zag pa dang /_srid pa'i zag pa dang /_ma rig pa'i zag pa dang /_lta ba'i zag pa rnams spangs te zad par gyur pa la yang /_zag pa zad pa zhes bya ste/_de la 'dod pa'i zag pa ni/_'dod pa'i
[\[4b.6\]]khams su gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams so/_/srid pa'i zag pa ni gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams so/_/ma rig pa'i zag pa ni khams gsum char gyi ma rig pa'o/_/lta ba'i zag pa ni/_lta ba lnga ste/_
[\[4b.7\]]'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang /_log par lta ba dang /_lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'o/_/chos 'di rnams kyis sems can rnams 'khor bar 'khor zhing ngan song du ltung bar byed pa'i phyir zag pa
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]zad pa zhes bya'o/_/nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par smin pa'i phung po'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams spangs shing
[\[5a.2\]]med pa la bya ste/_de la las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa ni 'du byed kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i las rnams byed pas nyon mongs pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams so/_/rnam par smin pa'i
[\[5a.3\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa ni sdug bsngal zhing nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i gzhi phung po lnga la bya'o/_/skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni ma'i mngal nas 'byung ba'i tshe sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong ba ste/_de rnams med pa la nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/dbang du gyur pa
[\[5a.4\]]zhes bya ba ni dbang bzhi dang ldan pa la bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang /_dbang po la dbang ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba dang /_shes rab la dbang ba'o/_/de la rdzu 'phrul la dbang bas ni sems can gyi 'jig rten dang /_snod kyi 'jig rten
[\[5a.5\]]de dag gi dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dbang po la dbang bas ni spyod lam nye bar zhi bas de dag la 'jig rten rnams dga' ba skye bar byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin la dbang bas ni bdag gi sems dbang du 'gyur ro/_/shes rab la dbang bas ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang rnam par smin pa
[\[5a.6\]]thams cad med par byed de bcings pa las grol ba bzhin du rang dbang thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya bas ni sred pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs par bstan pa ste/_de ltar sems
[\[5a.7\]]rnam par grol ba thob pas ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol bar gyur pa bstan to/_/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya bas ni ma rig pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa bstan te/_de ltar shes rab rnam par grol ba thob pas
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir/_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol bar bstan to/_/cang shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa med pa la bya ste/_de bas na mdo sde dag las kyang /_'jigs pa med pa'i phyir cang shes pa lnga gsungs pa lta bu ste/_lce 'bab pa
[\[5b.2\]]la sogs pa 'byung ba'i bag tsha ba dang /_'jigs pa med pas khyu mchog cang shes pa dang /_'thab mo'i 'jigs pa med pas rta dang glang po che cang shes pa dang /_gzhan gyis gnod pa byed pa'i 'jigs pa med pas seng ge cang shes pa dang /_'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med pas dgra
[\[5b.3\]]bcom pa cang shes pa rnams so/_/'dir ni cang shes pa zhes bya bas bag tsha ba bzhi med pa bstan te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal gyis bag tsha ba dang /_'jigs pas bag tsha ba dang /_'jig rten gyi chos kyis bag tsha ba dang /_mi shes pas bag tsha ba'o/_/de la mya
[\[5b.4\]]ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba rnams med pas sdug bsngal gyis bag tsha ba med do/_/bdag gis smad pa dang /_gzhan gyis smad pa dang /_ngan 'gror ltung ba dang /_'tsho ba mi 'byor ba dang /_chad pas gcad du dogs pa dang /_mi snyan
[\[5b.5\]]par grags su dogs pa dang /_'chi bas 'jigs pa rnams med pa'i phyir 'jigs pa'i bag tsha ba med do/_/rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang /_grags pa dang ma grags pa dang /_bstod pa dang smad pa dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis gos pa med pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi chos
[\[5b.6\]]kyis bag tsha ba med do/_/mi shes pa dang /_the tshom dang bcas par shes pa dang /_log par shes pa med pa'i phyir/_mi shes pa'i bag tsha ba med de/_de bas na de lta bu'i bag tsha ba rnams med pa'i phyir cang shes pa zhes bya'o/_/glang po chen po zhes bya ba ni gtso bo chen
[\[5b.7\]]po zhes bya ba'i don te/_khyad par rtogs pa'i chos thob pa'i phyir glang po chen po zhes bya'o/_/bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa zhes bya bas ni/_bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/_las kyi gtso bor mi byar mi rung ba la ni bya ba zhes bya'o/_/zhar la bya
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]ba ni byed pa zhes bya ste/_de la las kyi gtso bo mi byar mi rung ba yang tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab yongs su rdzogs par byas pas sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par thar bar bya ba ste/_de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas pa la bya ba
[\[6a.2\]]byas pa zhes bya'o/_/zhar la bya ba ni 'dod pa chung bar bya ba dang /_chog shes par bya ba dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad mgu bar bya ba la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa ni byed pa byas pa zhes bya ste/_de bas na bya ba byas pa
[\[6a.3\]]byed pa byas pa zhes bya ba 'dis bsgrub par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i yon tan bstan to/_/khur bor ba zhes bya ba la/_khur ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_phung po'i khur dang /_nyon mongs pa'i khur dang /_khas 'ches pa'i khur dang /_brtson 'grus kyi
[\[6a.4\]]khur rnams te/_de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes pas ni phung po'i khur bor ro/_/kun 'byung ba spangs pas ni nyon mongs pa'i khur bor ro/_/lam bsgoms pas ni khas 'ches pa'i khur bor ro/_/'gog pa mngon sum du byas pas ni brtson 'grus kyi
[\[6a.5\]]khur bor bar shes par bya'o/_/bdag gi don rab tu thob pa zhes bya ba la/_bdag gi don thob pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/_don ma yin pa spangs pa dang /_don du gnyer ba grub pa'o/_/de la ma rig pa spangs pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs par gyur pa ni/_
[\[6a.6\]]don ma yin pa spangs pa'o/_/rig pa bskyed pas mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa ni don du gnyer ba grub pa'o/_/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa zhes bya ba ni srid par sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa dgu spangs pa la bya ste/_srid par sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa dgu gang zhe na/_lta ba'i
[\[6a.7\]]kun tu sbyor ba dang /_mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /_the tshom gyi kun tu sbyor ba dang /_phrag dog gi kun tu sbyor ba dang /_ser sna'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /_khong khro ba'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /_nga rgyal gyi kun tu sbyor ba dang /_ma rig pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /_
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]sred pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun du sbyor ba rnams te/_nyon mongs pa 'di rnams kyis sems can rnams 'khor bar skye bar sbyor ba'i phyir srid par kun du sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang
[\[6b.2\]]dag pa ni yang dag pa'i lta ba la bya ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba la goms par byas pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad yongs su spangs te/_sems yongs su dag par gyur pa la bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o/_/sems kyi dbang thams
[\[6b.3\]]cad la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa zhes bya bas ni bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la goms pa'i mthus sems la dbang thob pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/_sems la dbang thob pas bsam gtan bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_'gog
[\[6b.4\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la/_lugs dang mthun pa dang /_lugs dang mi mthun pa dang /_thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa la thags thogs med cing /_ji ltar 'dod par mnyam par 'jog nus pas snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la sems dbang du gyur pa yongs su
[\[6b.5\]]rdzogs shing mthar phyin pa sha stag go zhes bya ba'i don to/_/gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di ltar slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'ba' zhig de'i tshe rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dgra bcom par bya ba la slob
[\[6b.6\]]pa yin te/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yon tan smos pa'i nang du ma gtogs te/_de 'ba' zhig rgyun du zhugs pa yin gyis/_gzhan thams cad dgra bcom pa sha stag go zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de ltar 'khor dge slong rnams
[\[6b.7\]]bstan nas/_'khor dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams bstan pa'i phyir/_dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba kun kyang chos mthong ba
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]sha stag dang zhes bya ba gsungs te/_kun kyang chos mthong ba sha stag ces bya ba ni de dag thams cad kyang bden pa mthong ba sha stag go zhes bya ba'i don to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas byang
[\[7a.2\]]chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa ste/_tshad dang grangs nges pa ma smos pa ni/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa sna tshogs du ma nas 'dus pa sha stag ste/_mang ches pa'i phyir tshad dang grangs 'di snyed cig go zhes tshad dang grangs chod par ma smos so/_/_
[\[7a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' yang rnam pa lnga ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa dang /_rtsol ba dang bcas pa la mtshan ma med par gnas pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa la lhun gyis grub par gnas pa dang /_spyod pa nges pa la zhugs pa dang /_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams
[\[7a.4\]]so/_/de la sa dang po nas sa drug pa la gnas kyi bar du ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'o/_/sa bdun pa ni rtsol ba dang bcas pa la mtshan ma med par gnas pa'o/_/sa brgyad pa ni mtshan ma med pa la lhun gyis grub par gnas pa'o/_/sa dgu pa ni spyod pa nges pa la
[\[7a.5\]]zhugs pa'o/_/sa bcu pa ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa ste/_de la gzungs zhes bya ba yang chos
[\[7a.6\]]rnams kyi don dang tshig rnams phyin ci ma log par 'dzin pas na gzungs zhes bya ste/_mdor bsdus na dran pa dang shes rab la bya'o/_/so sor dbye ba rnam pa bzhi ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bzod pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i gzungs dang /_gsang sngags kyi gzungs dang
[\[7a.7\]]chos kyi gzungs dang /_don gyi gzungs so/_/de la bzod pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i gzungs ni chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma skyes shing rang bzhin gyis stong par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bsgom pa'i tshe shes rab dang dran pas bsgom pa'i don dang /_tshig ma brjed par
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]rtogs pas thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par rtogs par nus shing /_stong pas mi skrag par gyur pa la bzod pa thob pa zhes bya ste/_bzod pa de lta bu thob pa'i rgyu ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i tshe/_shes rab dang dran pa la bzod pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i gzungs zhes bya'o/_/_
[\[7b.2\]]gsang sngags kyi gzungs ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin grub cing sems la dbang du gyur pa'i mthu dang /_sngon gyi smon lam dang spyod pa'i shugs kyis/_sems can rnams kyi gnod pa sna tshogs bsal ba'i phyir gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams byin gyis
[\[7b.3\]]rlobs te/_de ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang sngags de dag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi gnod pa thams cad sel nus par 'gyur te/_de lta bu'i gzungs sngags byin gyis rlob pa'i mthu dang ldan pa la gsang sngags kyi gzungs zhes bya'o/_/_
[\[7b.4\]]chos kyi gzungs ni sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos nyan pa'i tshe sngon mi shes ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshig rnam grangs mang po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams ji skad bshad pa bzhin du shes rab kyis zin cing dran pas
[\[7b.5\]]yun ring por yang mi brjed par nus pa la chos kyi gzungs zhes bya'o/_/don gyi gzungs ni de ltar chos kyi tshig mang po bshad pa rnams phyin ci ma log par bzung ba'i don sa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa la
[\[7b.6\]]sogs pa 'bras bu thob par bya ba rnam pa mang po tshad med grangs med pa rnams thob par nus pa'i dran pa dang /_shes rab tu ldan pa la don gyi gzungs zhes bya ste/_de lta bu la sogs pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa la gzungs thob pa zhes bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa zhes bya
[\[7b.7\]]ba ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya phrag mang po rnams thob pa zhes bya ba'i don te/_ting nge 'dzin de dag gi mtshan nyid kyang 'og nas zhib tu 'chad do/_/stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/_mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can/_rtog pa med
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa zhes bya bas ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/_de ltar gong du bshad pa'i rim pas gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gtogs pas
[\[8a.2\]]na/_stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar stong pa nyid la spyod cing bsgoms pa'i rgyus/_gzugs la sogs pa phyi nang gi chos gang la yang dngos por mi lta zhing /_mtshan mar mi 'dzin pas na mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can zhes bya'o/_/de ltar chos
[\[8a.3\]]thams cad la dngos por mi lta zhing mtshan mar mi 'dzin na/_chos gang la yang chags pa med pas/_khams gsum gyi bde ba'am 'byor pa gang la yang bde bar rnam par rtog pa med cing /_de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir smon pa med pas na/_rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa
[\[8a.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin la legs par gnas pa de spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa bzhi thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[8a.5\]]bdag dang gzhan du rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir sems can mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang /_byams pa dang sdang ba med pa'i phyir 'du shes mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang /_chos thams cad de bzhin nyid tsam du zad pa'i phyir chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang /_'khor
[\[8a.6\]]ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la sems mnyam pa'i phyir mi gnas pa mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa ste/_bzod pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o/_/thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar chos thams
[\[8a.7\]]cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa de shes rab kyis chos thams cad stong par rtogs kyang /_snying rje chen pos sems can yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du yang mi byed la/_shes rab kyis chos thams cad stong par
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]rtogs shing /_nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pas 'khor ba la yang chags shing thogs pa med pa/_nyan thos ltar mya ngan las 'das pa la yang chags shing thogs pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa la/_thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/bstan pa zad mi
[\[8b.2\]]shes pa la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar gong du bshad pa'i rim pas thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/_sems can rnams la chos bstan pa'i thabs rnam pa mang po zad mi shes pa rnams la rab tu mkhas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa sha
[\[8b.3\]]stag go zhes bya ba'i don to/_/mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba ni de ltar chos bstan pa'i tshul la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji ltar chos bstan pa'i tshul la mkhas pa'i rgyu bstan pa ste/_sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir bsam
[\[8b.4\]]gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa'i mthus mngon par shes pa drug thob par 'gyur te/_mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis sems can gyi don rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa la mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ste/_chen po smos pa ni 'jig
[\[8b.5\]]rten pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa bas mthu dang yon tan khyad par du 'phags par che ba'i phyir ro/_/mngon par shes pa drug ni lha'i mig dang /_lha'i rna ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa dang /_gzhan gyi sems
[\[8b.6\]]shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang /_zag pa zad pa shes pa dang drug go/_/de la lha'i mig gis ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dge ba dang mi dge ba ci spyod pa rnams gzigs nas/_de dang mthun pa'i don mdzad do/_/_
[\[8b.7\]]lha'i rna bas ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_yi dgas dang /_mi rnams kyi sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba'i sgra thos nas de dag gi sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pas ni lus dang ngag gi sprul pa sna tshogs dang /_yo byad
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]kyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs sprul pas sems can rnams kyi so so'i yid dang sbyar te phan 'dogs so/_/gzhan gyi sems shes pas ni sems can gzhan rnams kyi sems la ci sems pa shes pas de dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_dbang po
[\[9a.2\]]la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen nas/_de dang mthun par chos ston cing phan 'dogs so/_/sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas ni sems can rnams tshe rabs snga ma la gnas gang dang gar skyes pa dang /_ci dang ci spyod spyod pa mkhyen pas/_de dang mthun par chos bstan pa la
[\[9a.3\]]sogs pas phan 'dogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sngon gyi spyod pa rlabs po che rmad du byung ba rnams bdag gis dran pas sems can rnams la bzlas pas sems can rnams dad pa bskyed pa dang /_rtag par lta ba dang /_chad par lta ba rnams la tshe rabs snga
[\[9a.4\]]ma byung ba'i rgyud bstan pas rtag par lta ba dang /_chad par lta ba las bzlog par mdzad do/_/zag pa zad pa shes pas ni byang chub sems dpa' bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa zad pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa zad par
[\[9a.5\]]gyur tam/_ma gyur pa yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i thabs ma yin pa yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpas de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen nas/_bdag nyid kyis zag pa zad pa mngon du mdzad do/_/byang chub
[\[9a.6\]]sems dpa' zag pa zad pa'i shes pa de nyid kyis/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas kyang chos de dag gis bdag nyid kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis sems can gyi don rnam pa sna tshogs pa
[\[9a.7\]]mdzad pa la mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba zhes bya'o/_/mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag tshe 'phos na yang mngon par shes pa drug po de dag nyams par mi 'gyur te/_mngon par shes pa drug po de dag ni byang chub
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]sems dpa' la tshe rabs thams cad du med par mi 'gyur te/_brgya la dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes na yang nyams shing med par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa zhes bya'o/_/mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar mngon par shes
[\[9b.2\]]pa drug dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can la phan 'dogs pa gtsor byed pas/_phan gdags par bya ba'i sems can de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rang bzhin gyis dga' ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i ngag nyan par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[9b.3\]]gdams shing rjes su bstan pa las srog gi phyir yang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/yang rnam pa gcig tu na/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon sbyin pa dang /_tshig snyan pa la sogs pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can
[\[9b.4\]]rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i bsod nams kyi mthu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang don dang ldan zhing /_rigs pa dang ldan pa'i tshig 'ba' zhig smra ba'i phyir mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa zhes bya ba ni bdag
[\[9b.5\]]dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par bya ba la le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/lus dang srog la mi lta ba zhes bya ba ni dam pa'i chos btsal ba dang /_sems can gyi don gyi phyir lus dang srog la mi phangs par dam pa'i chos btsal ba dang /_
[\[9b.6\]]sems can gyi don byed pa la bya'o/_/tshul 'chos pa med pa zhes bya bas ni lus kyi las yongs su dag pas log par 'tsho ba'i skyon med pa bstan pa ste/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa'i phyir gzhan dag la lus kyi spyod lam 'chos shing zhi ba dang tshul du shis par ston pa ni
[\[9b.7\]]tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o/_/kha gsag med pa zhes bya bas ni ngag gi skyon med par bstan pa ste/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa'i phyir gzhan dag la gcam pa'i tshig smra ba ni kha gsag ces bya'o/_/grags pa dang /_khe dang bkur sti'i sems med pa zhes bya ba ni yid
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]kyi las yongs su ma dag pa'i skyon med pa bstan pa'o/_/zang zing med pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya bas ni sbyor ba yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/_sems can rnams la chos ston na yang snying rje yongs su zin cing shes rab kyis shin tu sbyangs pas/_
[\[10a.2\]]rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa'i sems med pa la zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa zhes bya'o/_/'di yan chad kyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa man chad rtsol ba dang bcas shing mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa'i yon tan rnams bstan pa'o/_/chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs
[\[10a.3\]]par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa yan chad rtsol ba med cing mtshan ma med par gnas pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa yan chad ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs
[\[10a.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba thams cad ched du bsams shing btsal mi dgos par sngon gyi spyod pa'i shugs dang /_smon lam gyi mthus lhun gyis grub pa nyid du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /_chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma skyes par rtogs pas chos zab mos mi
[\[10a.5\]]'jigs shing mi skrag pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya'o/_/mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar chos zab mo la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor dang /_
[\[10a.6\]]rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i 'khor dang /_bdud dang mu stegs can la sogs pa'i 'khor gang dang gang du 'gro yang mi shes pas 'jigs shing bag tsha ba dang /_nyon mongs pa las gyur pa'i 'jigs shing bag tsha ba med pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa zhes bya'o/_/_
[\[10a.7\]]yid yongs su zhum pa med pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pas rgyal rigs dang bram ze la sogs pa'i 'khor gang dang gang du 'gro yang 'jigs shing bag tsha ba med de/_spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir yid yongs su zhum pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/_
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa zhes bya bas ni cis kyang mi brdzi ba'i mthu dang ldan pa bstan te/_bdud kyi las 'og nas 'byung ba rnams dang /_mdo gzhan las bshad pa'i bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya ba'i don te/_las kyi sgrib
[\[10b.2\]]pa rgyun bcad pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar gong du bshad pa'i rim pas mi shes pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa med cing /_bdud kyi las las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis bde 'gro dang /_ngan 'gror skye bar 'gyur ba med pa sha stag go zhes bya
[\[10b.3\]]ba'i don to/_/las dang nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa zhes bya ba ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i dgra rnams spangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba ni mu stegs can phas rgol ba rnams kyis
[\[10b.4\]]mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba zhes bya bas ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi shes pa dang /_bsam pa dang /_spyod yul rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes par mi nus pa zhes
[\[10b.5\]]bstan pa'o/_/chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bas ni phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams dang /_sa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa 'jig rten
[\[10b.6\]]las 'das pa'i chos rnams rab tu rtogs pas/_chos de dag gi rang gi mtshan nyid dang /_phyi'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye zhing /_gzhan la ston pa la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i don te/_de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa'i yon tan bstan to/_/_
[\[10b.7\]]bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa zhes bya bas ni sa dgu pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/_sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon bskal pa grangs med pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]sems can gyi don mthar phyin par bya bar smon lam btab cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsams pa rnams mthar phyin cing yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/_sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu dang /_spyod pa'i shugs kyis de yan chad sangs
[\[11a.2\]]rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i spyod pa dang /_sems can gyi don yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i spyod pa rnams 'bad cing btsal mi dgos par lhun gyis grub pa nyid du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas sangs rgyas su bsgrub pa dang /_sems can gyi don du
[\[11a.3\]]spyod pa rnams kyang gdon mi za bar 'grub pas spyod pa nges pa la zhugs pa zhes kyang bya ste/_de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa yang sngon yun ring po nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir/_bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa
[\[11a.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/_thog mar smra ba/_khro gnyer med pa zhes bya bas ni de ltar sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus spyod pa la nges par zhugs pas/_sa dgu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag sngon sems can rnams la tshad med pa bzhi spyod spyod pa'i rgyu
[\[11a.5\]]mthun pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa ste/_de la bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa zhes bya bas ni byams pa'i rgyu mthun pa bstan pa ste/_sngon sems can la byams pa spyod spyod pa'i rgyus dus thams cad du sems can rnams la bzhin 'dzum pa 'ba' zhig ston cing sems can rnams
[\[11a.6\]]dga' bar byed kyis/_nam yang ngo 'dzum nag cing sems can rnams mi dga' bar mi byed do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/thog mar smra ba zhes bya bas ni snying rje'i rgyu mthun pa bstan pa ste/_sngon sems can rnams la snying rje spyod spyod pa'i rgyus byang chub sems dpa' de dag
[\[11a.7\]]sems can glo bur du 'ongs pa ma 'dris pa rnams la yang snying rje'i shugs kyis sems can de dag dga' bar bya ba'i gtam gyis snga nas bsu zhing gsang por smra ba dag go zhes bstan pa'o/_/khro gnyer med pa zhes bya bas ni dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi rgyu mthun pa
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]bstan pa ste/_sngon sems can rnams kyi 'byor pa la phrag dog dang /_sems 'khrugs pa med cing /_dga' ba bskyed bskyed pa dang /_bdag la gnod pa byed pa dang /_nyes pa byung ba rnams la yang bzod cing dang du blangs te/_btang snyoms su 'jog 'jog pa'i
[\[11b.2\]]rgyus mi dga' ba dang khros shing 'khrugs pa'i mtshan ma bzhin khro gnyer can du nam yang mi 'gyur ba dag go zhes bya ba'i don to/_/snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pas pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
[\[11b.3\]]'gro 'gro ba dang /_mngon par shes pa la spyod spyod pa rgyu mthun pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa bstan pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag sngon sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yon
[\[11b.4\]]tan rnams brjod cing bstod bstod pa dang /_mngon par shes pa'i mthus sems can rnams kyi spyod pa dang /_bsam pa'i rjes su mthun par yid du 'ong zhing 'thad pa'i tshig gis chos ston ston pa'i rgyus sa dgu pa thob pa'i tshe yang lhun gyis grub pa nyid du de bzhin gshegs
[\[11b.5\]]pa rnams la bstod pa dang /_sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i tshe snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dag go zhes bstan pa'o/_/spobs pa mi chod pa zhes bya bas ni sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub
[\[11b.6\]]sems dpa' de dag 'khor gyi nang du chos smra ba chen po yin pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/_de dag so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pas 'khor mang po la chos ston pa'i tshe na/_spobs pa chen pos bshad pa la thags thogs med cing sus kyang zil gyis mi gnon pa dang
[\[11b.7\]]ldan pa dag go zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya bas ni 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba la mkhas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa bstan pa ste/_de ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan zhing spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]dang ldan pas lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'khor gang gi nang du 'gro na yang /_mi shes pas 'jigs shing bag tsha ba med de/_bdag gi shes pas ni 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon la/_gzhan sus kyang bdag zil gyis mi gnon pa'i phyir 'khor
[\[12a.2\]]mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung ba la mkhas pa zhes bya bas ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa bstan pa ste/_sems can gyi
[\[12a.3\]]don du chos ston pa dang /_dka' ba spyod pa'i brtson 'grus lhun gyis grub pas ci bya'o cog la skyo zhing yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_bskal pa du mar spyod kyang yun ring por thogs pa'i 'du shes med pas/_bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas pa yang yengs la zad cing 'das
[\[12a.4\]]pa'am/_de las byung bar byed pa la mkhas pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/_/de ltar sa dgu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la nges par zhugs pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan nas/_sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi yon tan
[\[12a.5\]]bstan pa'i phyir/_thams cad sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_rmi lam dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang /_nam mkha' dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_sprul pa dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa zhes bya ba gsungs te/_sa bcu
[\[12a.6\]]pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis don dam par chos thams cad dngos po med par rtogs kyang /_kun rdzob tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing bkur stir bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_sems can yongs su
[\[12a.7\]]smin pa dang rnam par grol bar bya ba'i spyod pa rnams sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu dang /_spyod pa'i shugs kyis btsal zhing 'bad mi dgos par lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'byung ste/_spyod pa de dag la yang dngos po dang mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing ma chags par spyod pa ni/_chos
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]thams cad sgyu ma dang smig rgyu la sogs pa lta bur khong du chud pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ste/_sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dpe rnam pa bcu bstan pa yang /_gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_the tshom tha dad pa rnams bsal ba'i phyir te/_chos thams cad rang
[\[12b.2\]]bzhin gyis stong ste/_dngos po med na ci'i phyir kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs su snang bar 'gyur snyam du sems pa la/_sgyu ma'i dpe bstan te/_dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis rta dang glang po che la sogs pa'i dngos po sna tshogs byas pa rnams kha dog dang
[\[12b.3\]]dbyibs la sogs pa'i khyad par sna tshogs su snang yang yang dag par yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du/_chos thams cad kyang kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i dngos por snang yang yang dag par yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'o/_/sems can kha cig ni de ltar chos thams cad
[\[12b.4\]]dngos po med na/_sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ci la yang dmigs te 'byung bar 'gyur snyam du sems pa la/_smig rgyu'i dpe bstan te/_smig rgyu la chu'i dngos po med par yang de la dmigs nas chu'i 'du shes skye zhing /_sems dang sems las byung ba
[\[12b.5\]]rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong zhing dngos po med de/_dmigs pa'i yul ma yin yang /_sems can rnams phyin ci log tu rtog cing 'khrugs pa las sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes
[\[12b.6\]]bstan to/_/chos thams cad dngos po med na skye ba dang 'jig par yang ji ltar 'gyur snyam du sems pa la chu zla'i dpe bstan te/_dper na nam mkha' la zla ba snang na ni chu'i nang du yang zla ba 'byung zhing snang bar 'gyur la/_nam mkha' la zla ba mi snang na ni chu'i nang gi zla ba
[\[12b.7\]]yang med cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_chos thams cad skye ba dang 'jig par snang ba yang phyin ci log tu rtog pa'i bag chags yod na ni snang la bag chags de dag byang ste med na skye ba dang 'jig par yang mi snang ngo zhes bstan pa'o/_/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]stong ste dngos po med na/_bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs te 'jig rten gyi tha snyad rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam du sems pa la/_rmi lam gyi dpe bstan te/_dper na rmi lam na bza' ba dang btung ba dang /_sbyin pa dang len pa dang /_bde ba dang
[\[13a.2\]]sdug bsngal la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs par snang yang dngos po'i rang bzhin du yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du/_chos thams cad don dam par dngos po med par yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba'i rmi lam dang 'dra'o zhes bstan pa'o/_/chos thams cad dngos
[\[13a.3\]]po med na ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam du sems pa la/_sgra brnyan gyi dpe bstan te/_dper na brag dang /_gcong rong smra ba med pa las sgra 'byung ba grag pa/_sgra gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'byung ba de bzhin du/_sgrar rtog pa'i rnam par
[\[13a.4\]]shes pa 'khrul pa las/_ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs rnams 'byung bar 'gyur gyi/_dngos po ni gang yang med do zhes bstan pa'o/_/chos thams cad dngos po med na/_ji ltar rgyu dang rkyen rnams las 'byung bar 'gyur snyam du sems pa la/_mig yor dang /_
[\[13a.5\]]nam mkha' dang /_dri za'i grong khyer gyi dpe bstan te/_dper na mig rab rib can du gyur pa'i rgyus skra shad 'dzings pa la sogs pa snang ba dang /_ri rab kyi ngos su rin po che bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyis nam mkha' sngon por snang ba dang /_yul gyi khyad par dang sprin dang nye ba'i rgyus/_
[\[13a.6\]]dri za'i grong khyer dngos su yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rgyu dang rkyen las 'byung ba yang don dam par yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'o/_/chos thams cad dngos po med na/_rgyu dang 'bras bu 'dra bar ji ltar 'gyur snyam du sems pa la/_gzugs
[\[13a.7\]]brnyan gyi dpe bstan te/_bzhin gyi rgyus me long gi nang du bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan bzhin dang 'dra bar snang yang /_bzhin yang dag pa ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu 'dra bar 'byung yang don dam par yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'o/_/chos thams
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]cad dngos po med na/_'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams ji ltar yod par 'gyur snyam du sems pa la/_sprul pa'i dpe bstan te/_dper na sprul pa rnams 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa'i lus kyi las dang /_ngag gi las rnams byed pa sna tshogs snang yang /_
[\[13b.2\]]dngos por yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du/_chos thams cad kyang kun rdzob tu bya ba sna tshogs byed par snang yang don dam par dngos po yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'o/_/sems yongs su zhum pa med pa zhes bya bas ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems shin tu rnam par
[\[13b.3\]]dag pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/_sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kha cig ni tshogs yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /_rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyis
[\[13b.4\]]'phags pa rnams kyi spyan sngar sems zhum par 'gyur yang srid kyi/_sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshogs yongs su rdzogs shing /_rnam par mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pa dang /_dbang po rnams thob pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad du sems zhum pa med
[\[13b.5\]]pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyu ba dang /_shes pa phra ba dang /_spyod pa dang /_mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa zhes bya bas ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyus sems can thams cad kyi sems
[\[13b.6\]]kyi spyod pa rjes su rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyu ba dang /_mos pa khong du chud pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes phra ba dang /_
[\[13b.7\]]spyod pa la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/_de la sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rjes su rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyu ba dang /_mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs khong du chud
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]nas sems can de dag gdul ba'i thabs la mkhas par gyur to/_/chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes zab cing phra ba dang /_spyod pa rgya chen po khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas par gyur pa dag
[\[14a.2\]]go zhes bstan pa'o/_/sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa zhes bya bas ni sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la brtson 'grus ma btang ba'i phyir/_byams pa chen po'i stobs dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba'i
[\[14a.3\]]phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa bstan pa'o/_/bzod pa rlabs chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i de dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khyad par can du dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas/_sa 'og ma dag la mi skye
[\[14a.4\]]ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa de dag shin tu sbyangs shing rgya che bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul zab cing phra ba rtogs par dka' ba rnams kyang rtogs par nus shing bzod pa rlabs chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/_de bas na byang chub sems
[\[14a.5\]]dpa' de dag gi mkhyen pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa la dar las chod pa tsam mo zhes bya'o/_/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa zhes bya ba la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi chos nyid de bzhin nyid la bya ste/_de bzhin nyid de dag gis
[\[14a.6\]]so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs par byed pa la yang mkhas la/_gzhan rtogs par byed du 'jug pa la yang mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos nyid zab
[\[14a.7\]]mo rtogs pas de dag gi sems kyang zab cing brtag dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems yongs su dag pas nyon mongs pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i don to/_/chos thams cad la dbang
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]shin tu thob pa zhes bya bas ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i chos thams cad sems tsam du zad par shes pas phyi rol gyi dngos po mi brtson par/_bdag gi sems kyis ci 'dod par bsgyur nus pa'i mthu dang ldan pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/_/las dang nyon mongs pa dang lta
[\[14b.2\]]ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba ni las dang nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i dbang gis khams gsum du mi skye ba zhes bya ba'i don to/_/bden pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bas ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis gzhan gyis
[\[14b.3\]]rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa la mkhas pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la zhugs pa zhes bya ba la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul ni skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i chos zab mo la bya'o/_/skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa nyid la
[\[14b.4\]]zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba ste/_de la zhugs pa ni rtogs shing khong du chud pa la bya'o/_/lta ba dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba la/_lta ba ni 'jig tshogs su lta ba dang /_mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang /_log par lta ba
[\[14b.5\]]dang /_lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'o/_/bag la nyal ba ni bdun te/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags bag la nyal ba dang /_khong khro ba bag la nyal ba dang /_srid pa'i 'dod chags bag la nyal ba dang /_nga rgyal
[\[14b.6\]]bag la nyal ba dang /_ma rig pa bag la nyal ba dang /_lta ba bag la nyal ba dang /_the tshom bag la nyal ba'o/_/kun nas ldang ba brgyad de/_rmugs pa kun nas ldang ba dang /_gnyid kun nas ldang ba dang /_rgod pa kun nas ldang ba dang /_the tshom kun nas ldang
[\[14b.7\]]ba dang /_phrag dog kun nas ldang ba dang /_ser sna kun nas ldang ba dang /_khrel med pa kun nas ldang ba dang /_ngo tsha mi shes pa kun nas ldang ba ste/_nyon mongs pa de dag dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to/_/kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa zhes bya ba la/_kun tu
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]sbyor ba ni dgu ste/_chags pa kun du sbyor ba dang /_khong khro ba kun du sbyor ba dang /_nga rgyal kun du sbyor ba dang /_ma rig pa kun du sbyor ba dang /_lta ba kun du sbyor ba dang /_mchog tu 'dzin pa kun du sbyor ba dang /_the tshom kun du sbyor ba dang /_phrag dog
[\[15a.2\]]kun du sbyor ba dang /_ser sna kun du sbyor ba ste/_nyon mongs pa 'di rnams sems can rnams 'gro ba rgyud lngar skye bar byed cing /_kun tu sbyor ba'i phyir kun du sbyor ba zhes bya ste/_nyon mongs pa de rnams spangs pa la kun du sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa zhes bya'o/_/las dang
[\[15a.3\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/_/bden pa rab tu
[\[15a.4\]]rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa rnams bdag dang gzhan gyis rtogs par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu
[\[15a.5\]]rgyun mi 'chad par mos pa zhes bya bas ni lung gi chos gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis la sogs pa sgra dang tshig gi rang bzhin du grag pa rnams la/_dngos por mi lta bar sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtogs pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/_/chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la
[\[15a.6\]]'jigs pa med pa zhes bya bas ni de ltar lung gi chos rnams la/_don dam par dngos por mi lta yang /_kun rdzob tu sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i chos kyi tshul bstan pa rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pas/_'khor gang dang gang du
[\[15a.7\]]chos de dag rnam par phye zhing ston pa la 'jigs shing bag tsha ba med pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/_/bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa zhes bya bas ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyus/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]kyi spyod yul la 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul yang rnam pa gnyis te/_don dam pa'i bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du thugs su chud pa dang /_kun rdzob kyi chos rnams kyi bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du thugs su chud
[\[15b.2\]]pa'o/_/de la don dam pa'i bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du thugs su chud pa ni don dam par chos thams cad de bzhin nyid tsam du zad de/_mtshan ma dang rtog pa thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa'o/_/kun rdzob tu bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du thugs su chud pa ni sems can yongs
[\[15b.3\]]su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod pa bla na med pa rnams te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa zhes bya
[\[15b.4\]]ba'i don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rnam par bkod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa zhes bya bas ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i rgyus sngon smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du grub pa'i yon tan bstan pa ste/_sngon byang chub
[\[15b.5\]]sems dpa'i sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can dang /_pad+mo can la sogs pa'i rgyan dang bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa rnams mthong zhing thos nas/_nam bdag mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu'am/_de
[\[15b.6\]]bas kyang lhag pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang /_smon lam dang mthun par brtson 'grus brtsams shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i mthus sa bcu la gnas pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de lta bu dang ldan
[\[15b.7\]]par gyur pa las sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mtha' yas pa rnam par bkod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa zhes bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon du gyur pa zhes bya bas
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa bstan pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag sngon sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa'i dbang gis sa bcu la gnas pa'i tshe yang 'jig rten gyi
[\[16a.2\]]khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad mngon du gyur cing /_sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan snga na rtag tu gnas pa dag go zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa zhes bya
[\[16a.3\]]bas ni 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad du song nas mchod cing bkur sti bya ba la mkhas pa dag go zhes bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba btab par mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams tshad
[\[16a.4\]]med grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyi drung du song nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams yun ring du bzhugs par bya ba'i phyir gsol ba
[\[16a.5\]]'debs pa la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sems can gyi lta ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa zhes bya bas ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa ste/_sems can rnams kyi
[\[16a.6\]]bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_spyod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_dbang po tha dad pa rnams gzigs nas/_de dag la ci rigs par chos bstan cing nan tan byed du bcug pas de dag gi lta ba sna tshogs las gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams thabs mkhas pas zhi
[\[16a.7\]]bar bya ba la mkhas pa dag go zhes bya ba'i don to/_/ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par sgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa zhes bya bas ni mngon par shes pa'i rgyu ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan par bstan pa ste/_
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]sngon ting nge 'dzin rnam pa mang po bsgoms pa'i mthus rdzu 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rol cing /_sems can gyi don rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad pa la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa zhes bya bas ni sa bcu la gnas
[\[16b.2\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yon tan re re nas brjod na bskal pa mtha' yas par brjod kyang mi rdzogs pa'i yon tan de lta bu dag dang ldan pa sha stag go zhes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan brjod pa mjug bsdus te bstan pa'o/_/'di ltar byang chub sems
[\[16b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bzhugs pa thams cad kyi mtshan brjod kyis kyang mi lang bas de dag gi nang nas gtso bo nyung shas cig gi mtshan brjod de
[\[16b.4\]]bstan pa'o/_/'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams kyi mtshan ni ma brjod la/_'khor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan ci'i phyir brjod ce na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthu che ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags pa dang /_byang chub
[\[16b.5\]]sems dpa'i theg pa la gtogs pa'i phyir ming khyad par du brjod do/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bstan pas mdo sde thams cad dang mthun pa'i gleng gzhi bstan nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa'i gleng gzhi khyad par can bstan
[\[16b.6\]]pa'i phyir/_de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas sku drang por bsrang ste/_dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_de la bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri
[\[16b.7\]]bshams pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa 'di thun mong ma yin par bstan pa dang /_dkon zhing rin che bas mchod cing bkur sti bya bar 'os pa yin par bstan pa dang /_'khor rnams gdul ba'i phyir te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa'i gdan yang
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bshams pa dang sbyar na/_'di bshad pa yang gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin te thun mong ma yin par mngon no/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan bshams pa dang sbyar na/_chos bshad pa 'di dkon zhing rin che bas
[\[17a.2\]]mchod cing bkur sti bya bar 'os pa yin par mngon no/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan bshams nas 'khor rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyang chos bshad pa 'di la de lta bu'i bkur sti dang /_rim gro mdzad na bdag cag lta smos kyang ci
[\[17a.3\]]dgos snyam nas chos bshad pa la rim gro cher byed du gzhug pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan bshams par rig par bya'o/_/sku drang por bsrang ba dang /_skyil mo krung bcas par bstan pas ni gdul bya'i 'gro ba rnams sgom pa dang mthun pa'i lus rab tu sbyangs
[\[17a.4\]]shing las su rung bar bya ba bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/dgongs pa mngon du gzhag pa bstan pas ni gdul bya'i 'gro ba rnams ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa la sogs pa la sems rtse gcig tu gnas shing las su rung bar bya ba'i phyir dran pa mngon du gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/chos bshad
[\[17a.5\]]pa'i gleng gzhi 'di yang /_cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te/_ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul dang /_byin gyi rlabs kyis cho 'phrul dang /_chos snang ba'i cho 'phrul gyis bstan to/_/de la ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis kyis bstan te/_ting nge
[\[17a.6\]]'dzin gyi rgyal po dang /_seng ge rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la der zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang /_khong du chud pa dang /_rjes su 'brang ba dang /_'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la
[\[17a.7\]]mnyam par gzhag go zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul bstan te/_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba yang ting nge 'dzin 'di la mnyam par gzhag nas/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi don 'grub cing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mthu dang /_
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]yon tan dang ldan pa rgyal po dang 'dra ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/de bas na ting nge 'dzin der ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang /_khong du chud pa dang /_rjes su 'brang ba dang /_'du bar 'gyur ba zhes gsungs te/_de la 'du ba dang khong du chud pa zhes bya
[\[17b.2\]]bas ting nge 'dzin de dag thams cad rnam par mi rtog cing mi g.yo la/_sems rtse gcig tu gnas shing btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin du gcig ste tha mi dad pa bstan to/_/rjes su 'brang ba dang /_'du bar 'gyur ba zhes bya bas ni 'od zer 'gyed pa dang /_sems can
[\[17b.3\]]gyi don bya ba la sogs pa don du bsgrub pa rnams gcig par bstan to/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul de yang rnam pa bzhis bstan te/_yan lag dang nying lag las 'od zer 'gyed pa dang /_spu'i khung bu nas 'od zer 'gyed pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis 'od zer 'gyed
[\[17b.4\]]pa dang /_ljags kyi dbang po las 'od zer 'gyed pa'o/_/de la de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so/_/de ltar gzigs nas
[\[17b.5\]]sku thams cad nas 'od rab tu bkye ste zhes bya ba nas/_sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang /_'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni yan lag dang nying lag
[\[17b.6\]]nas 'od zer 'gyed pa'i cho 'phrul bstan te/_de la de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas zhes bya bas ni/_de ltar ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa las/_sngon gyi smon lam dgongs shing sems can gyi don bya ba'i dus la bab pa mkhyen
[\[17b.7\]]pa bstan to/_/'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so zhes bya bas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams skal ba dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa brtag pa'i phyir gzigs pa bstan to/_/bcom ldan 'das la ni de ltar dgongs shing
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]gzigs pa'i rtogs pa mi mnga' mod kyi gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyis de ltar mthong ba dang /_chos sdud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod du rung bar bya ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi skye bo rnams chos 'chad pa la nan
[\[18a.2\]]tan bskyed pa'i tshul bstan pa'i phyir de lta bu bshad do/_/'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer ni kha dog rnam pa drug yod de/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_
[\[18a.3\]]'od gsal ba'o/_/'od zer kha dog drug po de dag phyogs bcur rnam par 'phros na drug cur 'gyur ro/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gyur pa ni gdul bar bya ba'i sems can mang ba dang /_don du bsgrub pa mang ba'i phyir 'od zer kha dog sna gcig las kyang de snyed du 'phros par
[\[18a.4\]]rig par bya'o/_/drug cu drug cu zhes lan gnyis smos pa ni/_zhabs gnyis la sogs pa sku'i yan lag dang nying lag phal cher gnyis gnyis yod pa brtsan par byas nas lan gnyis su bzlas te gsungs par rig par bya'o/_/'od zer de dag kyang don rnam pa gnyis
[\[18a.5\]]sgrub ste/_'jig rten gyi khams rnams kun tu snang bar byed pa'i don sgrub pa dang /_sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i don sgrub pa'o/_/de la 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
[\[18a.6\]]thams cad snang bar byas te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kun du snang bar bya ba'i don sgrub pa bstan to/_/sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang /_'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
[\[18a.7\]]nges par gyur to zhes bya bas ni sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i don sgrub pa bstan to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu dgye ba mdzad de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni/_spu'i khung bu nas 'od zer 'gyed pa'i cho 'phrul bstan te/_
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]'od zer de dag kyang don dam pa gnyis sgrub pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer 'gyed pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ste/_'od zer de dag
[\[18b.2\]]kyang don dam pa gnyis sgrub pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/rang bzhin gyi 'od ces bya ba ni sku mdog bzang zhing 'od gsal ba 'phros pa la bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ljags kyi dbang po las 'od
[\[18b.3\]]zer 'gyed pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ste/_zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pas ni/_bcom ldan 'das chos 'chad pa'i snga
[\[18b.4\]]ltas bstan to/_/ljags kyi 'od zer de dag thams cad las pad+ma rnams byung ba bstan pas ni/_chos 'di nyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams pad+ma cis kyang ma gos pa ltar/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la nges par 'jug par gyur pa'i mtshan ma bstan to/_/pad+ma de dag
[\[18b.5\]]la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos 'di nyid ston pa bstan pas ni/_byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di nyan nyan pa de dag pad+ma kha phye zhing rgyas pa bzhin du blo rgyas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas
[\[18b.6\]]nas/_phyogs phyogs su pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par gzhag ste
[\[18b.7\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul bstan te/_cho 'phrul 'di yang snod kyi 'jig rten bzang zhing bde bar byi dor bya ba dang /_sems can gyi 'jig rten la phan gdags pa dang rnam pa gnyis su bstan te/_de la snod kyi 'jig
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]rten bzang zhing bde bar byi dor bya ba'i cho 'phrul ni/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te zhes bya ba nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba skyed par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan te/_rnam pa
[\[19a.2\]]drug tu g.yos pa ni g.yos pa dang /_'gul ba dang /_ldeg pa dang /_chem chem zer ba dang /_'ur 'ur zhes zer ba dang /_shig shig ces zer ba rnams te/_re re la yang drag dal rnam pa gsum gsum ste/_dang po dal bus g.yos pa la g.yos pa zhes bya'o/_/_
[\[19a.3\]]de'i 'og tu 'bring du g.yos pa la rab tu g.yos pa zhes bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu de bas kyang drag tu g.yos pa la kun du g.yos pa zhes bya ste/_lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/_dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' zhes bya ba ni de ltar rnam pa drug tu
[\[19a.4\]]g.yos pa nyid kyi tshe/_mtha' dang dbus mthon dman du gyur pa la bya bas rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa'i nang du gtogs te logs shig tu mi bgrang ngo /_/dal bus bags kyis nyams su bde ba dang /_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba skyed par gyur to zhes bya
[\[19a.5\]]bas ni de ltar rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa'i tshe yang /_sems can rnams sngang zhing skrag pa la sogs par mi 'gyur bar ri dang sa gzhi dang rtsi shing la sogs pa yang la 'jam zhing snum pa dang nyams dga' bar gyur to zhes bstan to/_/de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la
[\[19a.6\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_mi khom pa dang /_ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad
[\[19a.7\]]par gyur te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sems can gyi 'jig rten la phan gdags pa'i cho 'phrul bstan te/_sems can gyi 'jig rten la phan gdags pa'i cho 'phrul de yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can ngan song rgyud gsum la sogs pa
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]na gnas pa dang /_phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams ngan song rgyud gsum la sogs pa na gnas pa ngan song gi sdug bsngal nas thar cing mtho ris kyi bde ba myong bar gyur pa dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
[\[19b.2\]]na sems can dmus long dang /_'on pa la sogs pa'i mi bde ba dang bcas pa rnams kyang mi bde ba de dag las thar ba dang /_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dang /_'tsho ba mi dge ba rnams kyang dge bar gyur pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyang gcig la gcig pha ma dang /_
[\[19b.3\]]phu nu la sogs pa dang 'dra bar sems mnyam par gyur pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang /_gtsang sbra che ba dang /_nyes pa'i skyon med pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /_sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i shes
[\[19b.4\]]rab dang ldan par gyur pa ste/_de la mi khom pa zhes bya ba ni dam pa'i chos mngon par rtogs shing 'phags pa'i sa thob par bya ba'i skabs dang skal ba med pa la bya'o/_/mi khom pa de yang rnam pa brgyad de/_brgyad gang zhe na/_sems can dmyal bar skyes pa dang /_dud 'gro'i
[\[19b.5\]]skye gnas su skyes pa dang /_yi dgas su skyes pa dang /_mtha' 'khob kyi kla klor skyes pa dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_'du shes med pa'i srid par skyes pa dang /_dmus long dang /_'on pa dang /_lkugs pa la sogs par gyur pa dang /_log par lta bar
[\[19b.6\]]gyur pa dang /_sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal pa la skyes pa rnams so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma bsgribs pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa'am zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar zhes
[\[19b.7\]]bya ba nas de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_dbang po dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa zil gyis gnon par bzhugs shing /_'od dang sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang dpal gyis
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gzi brjid chen po'i yon tan bstan pa ste/_nyi ma dang zla bas skar ma la sogs pa'i 'od can thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang /_ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis ri gzhan rnams
[\[20a.2\]]zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa rnams zil gyis mnan te bzhugs so zhes bstan te/_'od kyis ni tshangs pa'i 'od bsnyems pa rnams zil gyis mnan no/_/sku mdog gis ni brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha mdog bzang
[\[20a.3\]]po bsnyems pa rnams zil gyis mnan to/_/gzi brjid kyis ni bdud dang mu stegs can rnams zil gyis mnan to/_/dpal gyis ni mi rnams zil gyis mnan te bzhugs so/_/'od dang ldan pas ni mdzes so/_/sku mdog dang ldan pas ni lham me'o/_/gzi
[\[20a.4\]]brjid dang ldan pas ni lhan ne'o/_/dpal dang ldan pas ni lhang nger bzhugs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to zhes bya ba nas/_
[\[20a.5\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang /_lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos bstan to snyam
[\[20a.6\]]mo zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni byin gyi rlabs kyi cho 'phrul bstan te/_byin gyi rlabs kyi cho 'phrul zhes bya ba yang bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas dad pa skyes te/_mchod
[\[20a.7\]]pa sna tshogs byed pa dang /_mchod pa byas pa'i me tog la sogs pa de dag kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du gnas par gyur pa dang /_
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang me tog dang dar gyi lda ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur pa dang /_me tog dang dar gyi lda ldi de dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
[\[20b.2\]]khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed shin tu mdzes par khyab cing gsal bar gyur pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sku gcig pu bstan kyang /_gling bzhi'i mi rnams dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha la sogs pa 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams kyi lha
[\[20b.3\]]rnams dang /_stong gcig dang /_stong gnyis dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang /_lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun
[\[20b.4\]]na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam du sems par byin gyis brlabs pa la byin gyi rlabs kyi cho 'phrul zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sku de mdog bzang zhing gzi brjid che la 'od gsal ba/_mthong
[\[20b.5\]]na skyo mi shes shing phyi phyir je bzang je bzang snang ba la bya'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs bzhin du 'od rab tu dgye ba mdzad de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni chos snang ba'i cho 'phrul bstan te/_chos snang ba'i cho 'phrul de yang rnam pa gnyis
[\[20b.6\]]te/_'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_'khor sdud pa'i cho 'phrul lo/_/de la yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to zhes bya ba nas/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na
[\[20b.7\]]sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od rab tu bkye ba mdzad pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /_
[\[21a.2\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab tu snang bar gyur te/_snang ba des 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
[\[21a.3\]]gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bas dga' ba dang dad pa skyes te/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa la mchod cing phyag 'tshal du 'ong 'dod par gyur to/_/de nas shar phyogs
[\[21a.4\]]logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'khor sdud pa'i cho 'phrul bstan te/_gong du smos pa'i rim pas sa g.yos pa dang 'od snang ba chen po 'byung ba dang /_
[\[21a.5\]]'od des mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzigs nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la
[\[21a.6\]]phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'dus shing gshegs par bya ba'i phyir/_'od rab tu dgye bar mdzad pa nyid la 'khor sdud pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems
[\[21a.7\]]dpa' de dag 'od zer gyis bskul te/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gshegs pa yang /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa sngon byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang smon lam gcig tu btab cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]spyod pa mthun par spyod spyod pa'i rgyus bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gdul zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad par gyur pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar gshegs par gyur to/_/shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi
[\[21b.2\]]khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na zhes bya ba la ni 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir pha rol gyi mtha' bltar med mod kyi/_'jig rten gyi khams gang tshun chad kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dir gshegs pa rnams kyi mtha' ma la kun gyi pha rol
[\[21b.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/kun gyi pha rol zhes smos pas de tshun chad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gshegs par blta'o/_/bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong zhes bya ba la yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das shing srog gi dbang po'i rgyun la bzhugs pa'i
[\[21b.4\]]phyir bzhugs zhes bya'o/_/sku la snyun mi mnga' ba'i phyir 'tsho zhes bya'o/_/glo bur gyi snyun mi mnga' bas sku tshe'i mnga' thang bzhin du tshe'i bar chad mi 'byung ba'i phyir skyong zhes bya'o/_/yang rnam pa gcig tu na chos kyi sku ni gnas pa'i rang bzhin pas chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin
[\[21b.5\]]du bzhugs pa la bzhugs zhes bya'o/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa rnams la/_chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod kyis 'tsho ba'i phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i tshul du bzhugs pa la 'tsho zhes bya'o/_/sprul pa'i sku ni sems
[\[21b.6\]]can yongs su ma dag pa rnams skyong ba'i phyir sprul pa'i sku'i tshul du bzhugs pa la skyong zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zham 'bring na bzhugs pa'i byang chub
[\[21b.7\]]sems dpa' de dag las kha cig ni rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags chung bas sems dang po bskyed pa nas tshangs par spyod pa la gnas shing sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang /_kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa yan chad la gnas pa thob pas rtsol ba dang /_
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bar 'os pa'i phyir rgyal po'i sras gzhon nu rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bar 'os pa dang 'dra bar chos kyi rgyal tshab kyi sa la gnas pa'i phyir gzhon
[\[22a.2\]]nur gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi kha dog can rnams bskur ba dang /_snyun gsol spring ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can rnams nga rgyal dang phrag dog med pa'i phyir te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang gcig la gcig
[\[22a.3\]]'di ltar sri zhu dang /_gus pa mdzad na bdag cag gis de ltar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems shing dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro/_/yang rnam pa gcig tu na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
[\[22a.4\]]rnams bzhugs par yid ches par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig ces bya ba ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i phyir/_bag yod par spyod cig ces gdams shing rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/_/de la
[\[22a.5\]]snyigs ma lnga ni nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang /_dus kyi snyigs ma dang /_che'i snyigs ma dang /_lta ba'i snyigs ma dang /_sems can gyi snyigs ma'o/_/de la nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma ni/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_
[\[22a.6\]]gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams shas che bas mi dge ba bcu'i las la sogs pa sdig pa'i chos mang du spyod pa dang /_de'i rgyus sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_yi dgas kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mang ba dang /_mir skyes na yang
[\[22a.7\]]sdug bsngal mang po dang ldan pa mang du snang ste/_de dag ni nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma las gyur to/_/dus kyi snyigs ma ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bar bar du mu ge'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa rnams 'byung /_bar bar du ni nad kyi sdug bsngal brnag mi bzod
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]pa rnams 'byung /_bar bar du ni sems can rnams gcig la gcig 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed pa'i dbang gis 'thab cing mtshon gyis 'debs pa mang du 'byung /_bar bar du ni chu'i 'jigs pa 'byung /_bar bar du ni me'i 'jigs pa 'byung /_bar bar du ni rlung gi 'jigs pa
[\[22b.2\]]'byung ste/_de lta bu'i dus ngan pa mang du 'byung ba la dus kyi snyigs ma zhes bya'o/_/tshe'i snyigs ma ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can rnams kyi tshe la nges pa med de/_bar bar du ni tshe'i tshad dpag tu med/_bar bar du ni tshe lo bcu par 'gyur/_de la
